R and xarray experiments

github.com/m3nin0-experiments/r-xarray-tests

(Experiment 1) - Simple xarray example in R
Example of how the xarray Python library can be used in R.
(Experiment 2) - Using xarray with dask
Example of how the xarray and the dask Python libraries can be used together in R.
(Experiment 3) - Processing raster data using rstac and xarray
Example of how the xarray can be used to handle spatio-temporal raster in R.
(Experiment 4) - Processing raster data using rstac and xarray (local data)
Example of how the xarray Python library can be used in R.
